definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The married patient hopes to conceive after completing a test tube baby programme.
sentences.chinese: 已婚的德亚希望试管婴儿项目完成后自己能怀孕。

sentences.english: Conclusion:The content of polysaccharides in protocorm is higher than that in test-tube plantlet .
sentences.chinese: 结论铁皮石斛原球茎多糖含量比试管苗多糖含量高。

sentences.english: Objective:To investigate the diversities of polysaccharides content of Dendrobium candidum and its test-tube culture.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较铁皮石斛试管培养物与原药材的多糖含量。

sentences.english: If you use a fastener there is a safe distance between the hand and the test tube when the tube is hot.
sentences.chinese: 当试管很烫时，试管夹可以使您的手不受伤害。

sentences.english: If you use a fastener there is a safe distance between the hand and the test tube when the tube is hot.
sentences.chinese: 当试管很烫时，试管夹可以使您的手不受伤害。

sentences.english: Chemical reaction do not take place in fizzing test tube.
sentences.chinese: 化学反应不会发生在起泡的试管里。

sentences.english: The technique is derived from a procedure already used during in vitro fertilisation .
sentences.chinese: 这项技术是基于现存的试管受精技术的一个中间环节。

sentences.english: Professor Zhang Lizhu, famous expert in Gynaecology and Obstetrics , and the first test-tube baby on Mainland.
sentences.chinese: 著名妇产科学家张丽珠教授与中国大陆首例试管婴儿。

sentences.english: The finding was based on test-tube experiments with mice cells.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究设计基于使用小鼠细胞的试管试验。

sentences.english: Methods The titer and affinity of anti-A secreted by hybridoma were tested by tube method and slide method.
sentences.chinese: 通过试管法和玻片法检测抗A抗体的效价和亲和力。

sentences.english: Within five years, 150 test-tube babies had been born worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 短短5年，全世界有150位试管婴儿诞生。

sentences.english: And this was a tube at low pressure.
sentences.chinese: 这是一根低压条件下的试管。

sentences.english: I remove the cotton wadding from the mouth of a tube and shake a gold finch onto my palm.
sentences.chinese: 我拿掉了试管口的棉花塞，把金色小鸟倒在我的掌心。

sentences.english: However, this conflict had previously only been shown in test tubes and Petri dishes, says West.
sentences.chinese: 但是，只是在试管中和皮氏培养皿中发现了这种冲突。

sentences.english: The Survival rate of plantlet is high in field.
sentences.chinese: 试管苗移植田间有较高成活率。

sentences.english: One approach is to convert the current test-tube setup into a paper-strip one.
sentences.chinese: 一个方法是将当前的试管测试装置转变为条形纸装置。
